mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_pw, board_title, board_content, board_user, board_date ) VALUES ( ${boardPw}, ${boardTitle}, ${boardContent}, ${boardUser}, current_date() )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_pw as boardPw, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_user as boardUser, board_date as boardDate FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}

SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_user as boardUser, board_date as boardDate FROM board ORDER BY board_date DESC LIMIT #{calPage}, #{rowPerPage}
